title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Explore the exciting world of motors and generators with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! With 25 guided STEM experiments, this kit is perfect for kids in grades 3-6, ages 8 and up. It includes a 48-page color student guide and has been recognized with the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award.

This kit allows kids to learn and play at the same time, making it a perfect educational tool for at-home learning or in the classroom. The electric motor is made with transparent plastic and can be reconfigured to a hand-crank electric generator, providing hands-on exploration of magnetic fields and electric currents.

With dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, and weighing just 1.3 pounds, this kit is portable and easy to use. It's a fantastic way to introduce kids to the world of STEM through engaging experiments and interactive learning. Don't miss out on this award-winning educational resource!

Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, the ultimate educational tool for young learners! With 25 guided STEM experiments, a 48-page color student guide, and a Parents' Choice Silver Award, this kit is perfect for children in grades 3-6, ages 8 and up. 

Featuring an electric motor with transparent plastic, battery-powered motor operation, and the ability to reconfigure to a hand-crank electric generator, this kit allows kids to explore magnetic fields and electric currents in a hands-on, interactive way. 

The full-color manual, with 60 pages of detailed instructions, ensures that children can easily follow along and understand the concepts they are learning. With experiments focused on magnetism, circuits, gears, and drive trains, this kit offers a comprehensive learning experience.

Not only is this kit educational, but it's also fun! Kids will love building simple circuits, experimenting with magnets, and learning about energy conversion. The compact dimensions make it easy to store and transport, and the durable construction ensures that it will last for countless experiments and discoveries. 

Invest in your child's education and love for science with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today!

With dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, this kit is the perfect blend of educational and entertaining. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to ignite your child's passion for science and technology! Get the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today.

Kids in grades 3-6 will love exploring the world of electric motors and generators with this interactive kit. They can experiment with magnets, build simple circuits, and learn about gears and drive-trains. The kit includes an electric motor with transparent plastic, and can be reconfigured to a hand-crank electric generator for even more learning opportunities.

With a full-color manual and dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, this kit is the perfect gift for young scientists. Help your child develop a love for STEM and make learning fun with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!
